application.name: cnetbin2pvl
application.brief: Converts an Isis3 control network file from binary into pvl format.

description.p: This program converts an Isis3 control network file from binary into a utf pvl formatted file. The output pvl will be written as the latest Pvl version. A link to the most recent Pvl template can be found here

history.change: Change parameter name to FROM and TO.
Updated Description to reflect utf file format. Added link to current Pvl template. Added user example.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: A control net file in binary format.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: A control net file in the Pvl format.

example.description: A binary V0001 ControlNetwork converted to the latest PVL network.
